text: - I'm Patrice Watson,
and I am a Global Account Representative

at AWS within the Media
& Entertainment Vertical.
So to my mum, I would describe what I do

as helping a large media and
entertainment awesome company
become the best they can be

with the most innovative
technology and access
to experts around the world.
Worked at AWS for about 15 months now.

So a veteran to many,
as we're hiring rapidly.
I think my biggest surprise
is just realizing how vast Amazon is,

even if you take the
AWS lens out of things.
And even AWS,
in and of itself is such a large ecosystem
of people and experts

across industries and geographic
regions around the world.
So it takes time.
You're constantly learning,
and it's all just

about having a beginner's
mind and owning your own path

and your own career,
figuring out who to meet

and how that will guide to what
you're trying to accomplish.
It's about taking ownership,

and it's about empowering
your teams and engineering

and product teams to
get access to training

and development for them
to be able to create
and actually understand the DNA
and what is made up of the engine
that's gonna fuel their future projects.
So being a builder can come in many forms
and you can choose how and when you build.
(inspiring music)
